decision_conditions: The modifications hereby approved shall be implemented within 2 months from the date of this decision notice and thereafter retained.  REASON:  In the interests of the appearance of the locality and the living conditions of surrounding occupiers, in accordance with Adopted UDP Policies B1, B5, B8, ES2, Replacement UDP Policies 4.1 and 4.5. | The brickwork in the raised side gable (west elevation) shall match the appearance of the existing brickwork in the west elevation.  REASON:  To ensure that the brickwork materials harmonise with the surroundings in accordance with the Adopted UDP Policies B1, B5, ES2 and H33, Replacement UDP Policies 4.1 and 5.5. | The replacement 'velux' rooflights shall be flush with the roofslope/conservation type rooflights and shall be permanently retained.  REASON:  To ensure that the rooflights harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with Adopted UDP Policies B1 and B5, Replacement UDP Policies 4.1 and 5.5.
description: Retention of works (in modified form) including the increase in height and change in angle of the approved mansard roof, raising parapet walls to rear and side, changes to brickwork and type of approved rooflights, as revision to planning approval Ref: AJ/TPEA/27562/3 for change of use of first floor office unit residential roof extension to form mansard creating a second floor, conversion of first and second floors into a 1 two bed and 1 one bed flats
